nodes.text: Kuari zinbiddle
Kuari Zinbiddle was a variation of Zinbiddle, the only difference was in Kuari Zinbiddle, each player had their own deck (non-custom.)
How to play
Object:

The First Time You Play:
Punch out all Cantocoins and dispose of the waste.

The Deck:
The deck consists of a maximum of 30 cards of your choice, every deck must have at least 1 Vermilion Six card.

Cantocoins:
Cantocoins are used for the pot and gambling.

Setup:
Choose someone to be the big blind, the big blind goes first and chooses the starting amount of Cantocoins in the pot.
Each player does the following:

How To Play:
The game is played in rounds, there are 3 rounds. On the first round, every player takes turns gambling, the round ends once everyone has chosen to stand or fold, once you stand, you can't place anymore bets. The on the second and third round, this is when you really edit your hand.
On Your Turn:
a. Draw the top card from your deck. (If you want to, you can also discard a card.)
b. Draw the top card from your discard pile.

What is an Ion Barrage?
The Ion Barrage hand is the winning hand, it consist of 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 of any suit and a Vermilion Six (Red).

What if there is a tie?
If there was a tie, the tied players draws a kicker card, whoever has the highest card wins the pot.

Winning the game:
The player with the Ion Barrage or has the hand closest to the Ion Barrage wins the round!

Ending the game:
The whole game ends once one person is left with Cantocoins.

Starting A New Round:
When a round ends, a new one starts. When a new round starts, players must discard their hand and repeat the Setup, and How To Play sections.
